independent span loss ( indep - I ).from sentence: Removing the independent span loss ( indep - I ) results in a performance drop for all answerable questions ( HasAns ) , indicating that this loss helps the model in better identifying the answer boundary .

independent no - answer loss ( indep - I.from sentence: Ablating independent no - answer loss ( indep - II ) , on the other hand , causes little influence on HasAns , but leads to a severe decline on no - answer accuracy ( NoAns ACC ) .

two auxiliary losses.from sentence: Ablating two auxiliary losses , however , leads to an over all degradation on the curve , but it still outperforms the baseline by a large margin .

both of two losses.from sentence: Finally , deleting both of two losses causes a degradation of more than 1.5 points on the over all performance in terms of F1 , with or without ELMo embeddings .

ELMo embeddings.from sentence: Adding ELMo embeddings , however , does not boost the performance .

improvement.from sentence: We find that the improvement on noanswer accuracy is significant .

RMR + ELMo + Verifier.from sentence: We observe that RMR + ELMo + Verifier achieves the best precision when the recall is less than 80 .
